turkish_example_sentence: Biz o karmaşık matematik problemini istememişolsak, çözmezdik.
english_example_sentence: If we had not wanted that complicated math problem, we would not have solved it.
russian_example_sentence: Если бы мы не хотели то сложную математическую задачу, мы бы её не решили.
turkish_example_sentence_with_blank: Biz o karmaşık matematik problemini ______, çözmezdik.
